blogs.title: The Beauty of Simplicity
blogs.body: Minimalism in design and code helps maintain clarity and reduces complexity in projects.
blogs.author: Selina

blogs.title: How to Stay Motivated While Coding
blogs.body: There are days when coding feels impossible. The bugs never end, the logic doesn’t make sense, and frustration builds up. But taking breaks, setting small goals, and celebrating progress can keep you moving forward. Remember — every coder struggles, even the experts.
blogs.author: hari ram
